body.pretty:
⊢ (T → CCfld ∈ *Ring)
⊣ (T → ℂ =(Base ` CCfld))
⊣ (T → + =(+ ` CCfld))
⊣ (T → × =(× ` CCfld))
⊣ (T → * =(*r ` CCfld))
⊣ (T → CCfld ∈ Ring)
⊣ ((T ∧ hs0 ∈ ℂ)→(* ` hs0)∈ ℂ)
⊣ ((T ∧ hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℂ)→(* `(hs0[+]hs1))=((* ` hs0)[+](* ` hs1)))
⊣ ((T ∧ hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℂ)→(* `(hs0[×]hs1))=((* ` hs1)[×](* ` hs0)))
⊣ ((T ∧ hs0 ∈ ℂ)→(* `(* ` hs0))= hs0)
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs0, CCfld)
⊣ d(hs0, ℂ)
⊣ d(hs1, CCfld)
⊣ d(hs1, ℂ)
⊣ d(hs0, T)
⊣ d(hs1, T)
